Class DefaultBitInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      java.io.FilterInputStream
          java.io.DataInputStream
              htsjdk.samtools.cram.io.DefaultBitInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
BitInputStream, java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataInput
public class DefaultBitInputStream
extends java.io.DataInputStream
implements BitInputStream

Must not read from delegate unless no bits left in the buffer!!!

Author:
vadim
